title: Tuna fishcakes
directions: Place the tuna, egg, spring onions, red pepper and breadcrumbs
in a bowl and mix well.
Shape the mixture into 8â€“12 fishcakes and place in the fridge
Heat a little oil in a non-stick frying pan and fry the fishcakes until golden all over. Drain on paper towel and serve with peas, baby potatoes and a salad.
ingredients: 2 can solid tuna in brine-drained 1 large egg beaten 4 spring onions finely chopped 1/4 cup finely chopped red pepper
2 Tbs breadcrumbs cake flour for dusting olive oil for frying
